io.github.daveho.funwithsound

Class RealizedInstrument

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.daveho.funwithsound.RealizedInstrument

  • public class RealizedInstrument
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the runtime instantiation of an Instrument. It consists of:
    • source: A MIDI Receiver interface, to which MIDI messages are sent
    • head: A "head" UGen, which is the synthesizer (and which processes the MIDI messages sent to the Receiver)
    • tail: A "tail" UGen, the tail of the effects chain (initially set to the head UGen, because the realized instrument starts out with no effects)
    The Player class also stores GainEvents here, and there is a gain UGen which controls the overall gain of the realized instrument.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      net.beadsproject.beads.ugens.Gain gain
      Gain UGen (which is fed by the UGen at the end of the effects chain.)
      net.beadsproject.beads.core.UGen head
      UGen at the head of the effects chain.
      javax.sound.midi.Receiver source
      MidiMessages to be played by this instrument should be sent here.
      net.beadsproject.beads.core.UGen tail
      Reference to the UGen currently at the end of the effects chain.

      • head

        public net.beadsproject.beads.core.UGen head

    • Constructor Detail

      • RealizedInstrument

        public RealizedInstrument(io.github.daveho.gervill4beads.GervillUGen gervill)
        Create an InstrumentInfo for a GervillUGen.
        Parameters:
        gervill - the GervillUGen

      • RealizedInstrument

        public RealizedInstrument(net.beadsproject.beads.core.UGen head,
                          net.beadsproject.beads.core.AudioContext ac)
        "Generic" constructor for instruments that wish to have MIDI messages sequenced/delivered automatically by a ReceivedMidiMessageSource. Most custom instruments will want to use this constructor. The head UGen should override the messageReceived method and use the Midi.hasMidiMessage(net.beadsproject.beads.core.Bead) and Midi.getMidiMessage(Bead) methods to detect and process received MidiMessages.
        Parameters:
        head - the UGen at the head of the effects chain (i.e., the synthesizer)
        ac - the AudioContext

      • RealizedInstrument

        public RealizedInstrument(javax.sound.midi.Receiver source,
                          net.beadsproject.beads.core.UGen head)
        "Generic" constructor: this is appropriate for custom instruments that define their own MIDI Receivers.
        Parameters:
        source - the MIDI Receiver
        head - the UGen at the head of the effects chain (i.e., the synthesizer or audio source)
